siteMetadata.title: Trafikito - monitor output of any command
siteMetadata.author: Lukas Liesis

markdownRemark.excerpt: Yes  Trafikito is fully compatible with phones and tablets. However,  when making customizations,  we recommend using a computer but it’s not a requirement…
markdownRemark.html:
Yes Trafikito is fully compatible with phones and tablets.

However, when making customizations, we recommend using a computer but it’s not a requirement.

Everything that you are able to do on a desktop, you will also be able to do on the go, using a mobile or a tablet.

frontmatter.title: Can I view the dashboard on my phone or tablet?
How many hours of logs do I need?
